ItemDescription: Old and fragile but it is yours... You looted it yourself!

AttackDescription: You poke with your cracked wand.
ItemDescription: It may be cracked, but nothing some duct tape couldn't fix!

AttackDescription: You fire an arrow from your flimsy bow.
ItemDescription: If you pull it too hard, it would probably snap. On the positive side, you'd have a nunchuck.
A wand made from flexible yew making it more durable and less likely to crack.
Long staff made of aspen wood that has twisted along the shaft.
Long staff made of black wood with a white, egg-shaped gem embedded on the top.

AttackDescription: You fire an arrow from your quick shortbow.
ItemDescription: Small and flexible perfect for hunting where speed is more important than power.

AttackDescription: You fire an arrow from your sturdy longbow.
ItemDescription: As tall as you are and very firm, this is made to penetrate armor.

AttackDescription: You fire an arrow from your marksman's recurve.
ItemDescription:
This bow bends away from the holder making it easier to draw therefore giving the wielder
more precision.
A plain sword but the steel is unusually black and it feels light.
A black double-edged sword that feels quite light.
Black steel with golden adornments, this was definitely custommade for someone powerful.
